Comment: This response provides a detailed and accurate explanation of where the names of the twelve disciples can be found in the Bible, along with noting the variations in the order of the lists. The inclusion of relevant Bible references adds depth to the answer. The only slight deduction is for not explicitly mentioning the Book of Acts, where the replacement of Judas Iscariot by Matthias is also documented. Great job overall!
